1 - Upload OpenAPI aka Swagger Definition File - Specific Name

body.body:
{
	"string_value": "openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: atm-locator
  version: 1.0.0
  description: API documentation for the atm-locator microservice

paths:
  /api/atm/:
    post:
      summary: Get all ATMs
      description: Get a list of all ATMs according to the filters
      tags:
        - ATM
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                isOpenNow:
                  type: boolean
                isInterPlanetary:
                  type: boolean
      responses:
        "200":
          description: ATM details successfully fetched
        "404":
          description: Invalid request

  /api/atm/{id}:
    get:
      summary: Get ATM by ID
      description: Get ATM details by ID
      tags:
        - ATM
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: ID of the ATM
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: ATM details successfully fetched
        "404":
          description: Invalid request
",
	"name": "<<openapi_spec_swagger_filename>>",
	"storedObjectType": "swagger",
	"actionId": "undefined",
	"type": "[stored_object] Upload Stored Object"
}
